plot: Justin is annoyingly smart. Clyde is a neat freak alcoholic. Bonnie is Clyde's sister who kinda likes Paul. And Paul creates outrageous fantasies in order to escape life.
plot_en: Justin is annoyingly smart. Clyde is a neat freak alcoholic. Bonnie is Clyde's sister who kinda likes Paul. And Paul creates outrageous fantasies in order to escape life.
plot_es: Justin is annoyingly smart. Clyde is a neat freak alcoholic. Bonnie is Clyde's sister who kinda likes Paul. And Paul creates outrageous fantasies in order to escape life.
title: Poor Paul
